item.title: Demonik Source - 2 Worlds, F2p, P2p, How to subscribe?
item.dc:creator: @elyad elyad
item.description:
@elyad wrote:

Dont really understand this :\ Plus i cant even find rank in the register.php :S

I dont mind changing it manually, just basically want top stop people being able to log into server 2. And then if i can edit some kind of rank for them as such :S so then they can login to server 2, that would be great!

Thanks though dumm1s Still confusssed lol

item.description:
@dumm1s wrote:

in register.php rank 1.
then make an easy php script to send rank 2(or w/e) to the playername when they donate.
but would still have to been done manually,
if you dont inegrate it with punbb or something it wont be easy
